data.title: Hole in the wall with great food.
data.text: Don Walker's has been a staple of Aurora for as long as I can remember.(I've lived in the area over 50years) The have outstanding food. You have to give this a try--and don't let the looks from the out side scare you away. Many Aurora policeman eat here!  lol

data.title: good food
data.text: Good food, nothing much in that area to choose from, parking not that great, but I've always found parking close enough.  Cool Coca-Cola decor inside.

data.title: Solid beef!
data.text:
I read the reviews and was in the neighborhood so I thought I would stop for lunch.  The beef looked like the thing to have, so I had to have it. 

I was familiar with the area so I had not problem finding it. It was busy at lunchtime but there was ample parking. The restaurant was clean and decorated well. 

So back to the beef.  It was good. Good beef and very juicy.  I really enjoyed it.  Reasonably priced too.  I would stop again.

data.title: Best Italian Beef Sandwiches in the country
data.text: I have tried these sandwiches all over the country.  These are the best and have been around forever.  I live in Palm Springs but whenever I get back to this neck of the woods this place is a MUST.

data.title: Relax with well prepared food
data.text: Local food institution that has done well with locals. Clean restrauant and fresh food prepared from your order. Comfortable booths with nostalgia in dining room.

data.title: Sandwich Heaven
data.text: Don Walker has all kinds a sandwiches that are very good and reasonably priced. For a quick sandwich for lunch or dinner, this is the place to go. They are known for their Italian beef.

data.title: A family favorite
data.text: Without a doubt, Don Walker's has the best Italian Beef ever.  When my brother comes to visit from Atlanta, his first stop is the sandwich center for their outstanding Italian Beef.

data.title: Little joint, but good.
data.text: My wife and I were passing through town. We stopped here to grab a bite to eat since she had been here years ago as a kid and said it was good. It's a little place with seating for maybe about 20 people. It looked like most people were doing pickup. The menu was broad, but she recommended that I get the 1/2 pound steak sandwich. Although it's not in the form of steak (more like a long burger) it was very, very good. It comes on Texas style grilled toast with just the right amount of butter on it. She got one too, but the differences were that she got the mushroom sauce and American cheese on hers and I got mine with mozzarella and minus the mushroom sauce. They were both very good. the fries were hot and fresh as well. Only drawback I see is that they don't offer free water. You can buy bottled water, but that's it other than soda. I would definitely go back and get the steak sandwich again or try something else if in town.

data.title: Don Walker deserves better.
data.text: What a waste, cut corners and serve crap. Not close to Don Walkers. The food sucks now. What a shame.

data.title: Great place.
data.text: I've gone here since I was a kid. I've moved out of state but the last time I was here the food was still the same, great... I've had requests from family members that when I go back to Aurora to stop here & bring them back an Italian Beef.
